error.checks: At least one service is unavailable.
head.title: Fastfony installation
step1.instruction: Uncheck the features you don't want:
step1.title: Ready to earn precious time?
step2.auto_generate_license_key: Generate automatically a new license key for my email address
step2.help_email: An email with connection link will be sent. You can customize this email later, more infos here.
step2.help_license_key: You can also directly get a license key on Fastfony.com.
step2.instruction: If we use default configuration with Mailpit, you can see emails in your browser : http://127.0.0.1:8025
step2.title: Necessary things for start
step3.instruction:
Your Fastfony installation is successfully finished! You have received an email with a link to connect.

If we use default configuration with Mailpit, you can see emails in your browser : http://127.0.0.1:8025
step3.title: Congrats!
